innerText: 6. Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgo
1. Suttantabhānīyaṃ

children.innerText: . Avijjāpaccayā

saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññaṇaṃ, viññaṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādanaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevaduk khadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

innerText: 225 . Avijjāpaccayāsaṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññaṇaṃ, viññaṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādanaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevaduk khadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

children.innerText: . That's the story avijja? Dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodghagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ''avijjā''.

innerText: 226 . That's the story avijja? Dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodghagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ''avijjā''.
Tattha katame avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā? Puññabhisaṅkhaaro, apuññabhisaṅkhaaro, āneñjābhisaṅkhaaro, kāyasaṅkhaaro, vacīsaṅkhaaro, cittasaṅkhaaro.
Tattha katamo puññabhisaṅkhaaro? Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā dānamayā sīlamayā bhāvanāmayā – ayaṃ vuccati ''puññabhisaṅkhaāro''.

children.innerText: Tattha katamo apuññabhisaṅkhaaro? Akusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā
– ayaṃ vuccati ''apuññabhisaṅkhaaro''.

innerText: Tattha katamo apuññabhisaṅkhaaro? Akusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā– ayaṃ vuccati ''apuññabhisaṅkhaaro''.

children.innerText: Tattha
katamo āneñjābhisaṅkhaaro? Kusalā cetanā arūpāvacarā – ayaṃ vuccati ''āneñjābhisaṅkhaāro''.

innerText: Tatthakatamo āneñjābhisaṅkhaaro? Kusalā cetanā arūpāvacarā – ayaṃ vuccati ''āneñjābhisaṅkhaāro''.
What do you say about that? Kāyasañcetanā kāyasaṅkhaāro, vacīsaṇcetanā vacīsaṅkhaāro, manosañcetanā cittasaṅkhaāro. Ime vuccanti ''avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''.

children.innerText: . Tattha
katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññaṇaṃ? Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaviññaṇaṃ, ghānaviññaṇaṃ, jivhāviññāṇaṃ, kāyaviññāṇaṃ, manoviññaṇaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''saṅkhārapaccayā viññaṇaṃ''.

innerText: 227 . Tatthakatamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññaṇaṃ? Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaviññaṇaṃ, ghānaviññaṇaṃ, jivhāviññāṇaṃ, kāyaviññāṇaṃ, manoviññaṇaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''saṅkhārapaccayā viññaṇaṃ''.

children.innerText: . Tattha katamaṃ viññaṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ? Atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. Tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati ''nāmaṃ''
, Tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? Cattāro mahābhūtā, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''rūpaṃ''. Iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati ''viññaṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ''.

innerText: 228 . Tattha katamaṃ viññaṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ? Atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. Tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati ''nāmaṃ'', Tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? Cattāro mahābhūtā, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''rūpaṃ''. Iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati ''viññaṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ''.

children.innerText: . Tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ? Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ''.

innerText: 229 . Tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ? Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ''.

children.innerText: . Tattha katamo saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso? Cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghānasamphasso jivhāsamphasso kāyasamphasso manosamphasso – ayaṃ vuccati ''saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso''.

innerText: 230 . Tattha katamo saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso? Cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghānasamphasso jivhāsamphasso kāyasamphasso manosamphasso – ayaṃ vuccati ''saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso''.

children.innerText: . Tattha

katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? Cakkhusamphassājā vedanā, sotasamphassājā vedanā, ghānasamphassājā vedanā, jivhāsamphassājā vedanā, kāyasamphassājā vedanā, manosamphassājā vedanā – ayaṃ vuccati ''phassapaccayā vedanā''.

innerText: 231 . Tatthakatamā phassapaccayā vedanā? Cakkhusamphassājā vedanā, sotasamphassājā vedanā, ghānasamphassājā vedanā, jivhāsamphassājā vedanā, kāyasamphassājā vedanā, manosamphassājā vedanā – ayaṃ vuccati ''phassapaccayā vedanā''.

children.innerText: . Tattha
katamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā? Rūpataṇhā, saddataṇhā, gandhataṇhā, rasataṇhā, phoṭṭhabbataṇhā, dhammataṇhā – ayaṃ vuccati ''vedanāpaccayā taṇhā''.

innerText: 232 . Tatthakatamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā? Rūpataṇhā, saddataṇhā, gandhataṇhā, rasataṇhā, phoṭṭhabbataṇhā, dhammataṇhā – ayaṃ vuccati ''vedanāpaccayā taṇhā''.

children.innerText: . Tattha katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā upādanaṃ? Kāmupādanaṃ, diṭṭhupādanaṃ, sīlabbatupādanaṃ, attavādupādanaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''taṇhāpaccayā upādanaṃ''.

innerText: 233 . Tattha katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā upādanaṃ? Kāmupādanaṃ, diṭṭhupādanaṃ, sīlabbatupādanaṃ, attavādupādanaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ''taṇhāpaccayā upādanaṃ''.

children.innerText: . What do you say to me? Bhavo duvidhena
– Atthi kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo. What do you do? Puññabhisaṅkhaaro, apuññaabhisaṅkhaaro, āneñjābhisaṅkhaaro – ayaṃ vuccati ''kammabhavo''. Sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo.

innerText: 234 . What do you say to me? Bhavo duvidhena– Atthi kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo. What do you do? Puññabhisaṅkhaaro, apuññaabhisaṅkhaaro, āneñjābhisaṅkhaaro – ayaṃ vuccati ''kammabhavo''. Sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo.

What will you say? Kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo, saññabhavo, asaññabhavo, nevasaññanāsaññābhavo, ekavokārabhavo, catuvokārabhavo, pañcavokārabhavo – ayaṃ vuccati ''upapattibhavo''. Iti ayañca kammabhavo, ayañca upapattibhavo. Ayaṃ vuccati ''upādanapaccayā bhavo''.

children.innerText: . Tattha
katamā bhavapaccayā caste? Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti, khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo
, āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho – ayaṃ vuccati ''bhavapaccayā jāti''.

innerText: 235 . Tatthakatamā bhavapaccayā caste? Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti, khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo, āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho – ayaṃ vuccati ''bhavapaccayā jāti''.

children.innerText: . Tattha katamaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ? Atthi jarā, atthi maraṇaṃ. What is that story? Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṃ pāliccaṃ valittacatā āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripāko – ayaṃ vuccati ''jarā''.

innerText: 236 . Tattha katamaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ? Atthi jarā, atthi maraṇaṃ. What is that story? Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṃ pāliccaṃ valittacatā āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripāko – ayaṃ vuccati ''jarā''.

children.innerText: Tattha katamaṃ maraṇaṃ?
Y
? _ Iti ayañca jarā, idañca maraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati ''jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ''.

innerText: Tattha katamaṃ maraṇaṃ? Y ? _ Iti ayañca jarā, idañca maraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati ''jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ''.

children.innerText: . Tattha

katamo soko? Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṃ sallasoko antoparisoko cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati. ok''.

innerText: 237 . Tatthakatamo soko? Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṃ sallasoko antoparisoko cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati. ok''.

, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo
ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ vācā palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappanā lālappitattaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati paridevo''.

innerText: 238 . Let's talk about it and see? Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevoādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ vācā palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappanā lālappitattaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati paridevo''.

children.innerText: . Tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ? Yaṃ kāyikaṃ asātaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ kāyasamphasajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā – idaṃ vuccati ''dukkhaṃ''.

innerText: 239 . Tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ? Yaṃ kāyikaṃ asātaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ kāyasamphasajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā – idaṃ vuccati ''dukkhaṃ''.

children.innerText: . Tattha
katamaṃ domanassaṃ? Yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ, cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ, cetosamphassājā asātā dukkha vedanā – idaṃ vuccati ''domanassaṃ''.

innerText: 240 . Tatthakatamaṃ domanassaṃ? Yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ, cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ, cetosamphassājā asātā dukkha vedanā – idaṃ vuccati ''domanassaṃ''.

children.innerText: . What did you tell me? Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa āyāso upāyāso āyāsitattaṃ upāyāsitaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ''upāyāso'' .

innerText: 241 . What did you tell me? Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa āyāso upāyāso āyāsitattaṃ upāyāsitaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ''upāyāso'' .

Suttantabhānīyaṃ.

2. Hetucatukkaṃ

children: . Avijjāpaccayā

saṅkhāro avijjāhetuko, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmahetukaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso chaṭṭhāyatanahetuko, phassapaccayā vedanā phassahetukā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vedanāhetukā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ taṇhāhetukaṃ; upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

innerText: 249. Tattha katamā avijjā? Yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ…pe… avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘avijjā’’.

children: Tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? Yā cetanā sañcetanā
sañcetayitattaṃ

children.innerText: [cetayitattaṃ (sī. ka.)]

children: – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro’’.
innerText: Tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro? Yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ [cetayitattaṃ (sī. ka.)] – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro’’.

Tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ’’.
Tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ’’.

Tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ’’.

children: Tattha
katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? Yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso’’.
innerText: Tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? Yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso’’.
Tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? Yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘phassapaccayā vedanā’’.

children: Tattha
katamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā? Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho nandī nandirāgo cittassa sārāgo – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘vedanāpaccayā taṇhā’’.
innerText: Tattha katamā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā? Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho nandī nandirāgo cittassa sārāgo – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘vedanāpaccayā taṇhā’’.

children: Tattha katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ? Yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ
diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho

children.innerText: [vipariyesaggāho (bahūsu)]

innerText: Tattha katamaṃ taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ? Tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇahetukaṃ? Atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. Tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘nāmaṃ’’. Tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? Cakkhāyatanassa upacayo, sotāyatanassa upacayo, ghānāyatanassa upacayo, jivhāyatanassa upacayo, kāyāyatanassa upacayo, yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘rūpaṃ’’. Nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ nāmarūpahetukanti. Atthi nāmaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ. Tattha katamaṃ nāmaṃ? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘nāmaṃ’’. Tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ? Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manoviññāṇadhātu vattati – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘rūpaṃ’’. Iti idañca nāmaṃ, idañca rūpaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati ‘‘nāmarūpaṃ’’.

innerText: Tattha katamo alobho…pe… adoso…pe… amoho? Yā paññā pajānanā…pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘amoho’’. Ime vuccanti ‘‘kusalamūlā’’.
Tattha katamo kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? Yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro’’…pe… ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso’’.
Tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? Yaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘phassapaccayā vedanā’’.
Tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā pasādo? Yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘vedanāpaccayā pasādo’’.
Tattha katamo pasādapaccayā adhimokkho? Yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘pasādapaccayā adhimokkho’’.

Tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? Ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo’’…pe… ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ’’.

children: Evametesaṃ

Tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ…pe… tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ’’.

children: Tattha
katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ’’.
innerText: Tattha katamaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ’’.
Tattha katamaṃ nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ? Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ…pe… tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ’’.

children: Tattha
katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? Yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso’’.
innerText: Tattha katamo chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso? Yo phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso’’.
Tattha katamā phassapaccayā vedanā? Yaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘phassapaccayā vedanā’’.
Tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho? Yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘vedanāpaccayā adhimokkho’’.
Tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? Ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo’’.
Tattha katamā bhavapaccayā jāti? Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jāti sañjāti nibbatti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo – ayaṃ vuccati ‘‘bhavapaccayā jāti’’.

children: Tattha katamaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ? Atthi jarā, atthi maraṇaṃ. Tattha katamā jarā? Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jarā jīraṇatā āyuno saṃhāni

– ayaṃ vuccati jarā. Tattha katamaṃ maraṇaṃ? Yo tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhānaṃ – idaṃ vuccati ‘‘maraṇaṃ’’. Iti ayañca jarā, idañca maraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati ‘‘jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ’’.
